name: ZeroB
description:
Setting foot in this park always feels so nice...

Sometimes, throughout one's life, anything from an upbeat conversation with your boss to life-changing events can all happen in the same place.

This is the case for the protagonist of this story - which you'll get to name - and a certain public park in their city.

Choose what actions the protagonist will take throught one of their visits to this park, and watch as bits and pieces of their life story are slowly revealed.
